title: Machine Learning by Stanford University
description: This course provides a broad introduction to machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Master Deep Learning, and Break into AI. Learn Deep Learning from the best: Andrew Ng.

title: AI For Everyone

description: Learn how to use Python for Data Science and Machine Learning with real projects.

title: Intro to Artificial Intelligence
